project.author: Michael Peters
project.description: conceal is a python package for developing a digital/fractal camouflage image
project.longDescription: following in the footsteps of the article "Introducing the National Algorithim" by Sjef van Gaalen about the new camouflage patterns of The Netherlands (NFP), this package aims to create a digital/fractal camouflage based upon images of the environment and supplied required colors
